message.body: Hi, "MrMuffins"! This is the TextPenn Chatbot. Welcome to the conversation.
The participants in this conversation are MrMuffins and sisyphus.
You have 23 hours to complete this conversation. You will be notified when time is up. Enjoy!
I'm on my way to Home Depot for plumbing supplies. My texts will be sporadic because I am driving and shopping.
sisyphus: Hey, sorry, just getting back to civilization. Ive been camping this wknd. How are you?
In and out of contact! Where'd you go camping?
Time is up! The TextPenn Chatbot is closing the conversation now. Thank you and hope to chat with you again soon!
